thread.section_title: SecurCare Self Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SecurCare Self Storage | securcareselfstorage.com | 3 of 75
thread.title: Holly S.
thread.title_full: SecurCare Self Storage reviewed by Holly S.

author: Holly S.
title: Holly S.
text:
I was moving from Denver to Colorado Springs and contacted seven storage facilities near my familiy's residence. After learning the common Q/A conversation, which intaled me pulling out information, I was pleasantly surprised and relieved when I contacted Stan. Stan explained the entire process with confidence that expresses knowledge and experience. His demeanor demonstrated the standard of professionalism that made me appreciate the value of belonging to his company which gave me peace of mind. You're awesome Stan, thank you for taking care of me.
Holly
